import React from 'react' import '../styles/home.css' import {Container, Row, Col} from 'reactstrap'; import heroImg from '../assets/images/hero-img01.webp' import heroImg02 from '../assets/images/hero-img02.webp' import heroVideo from '../assets/images/hero-video.mp4' import worldImg from '../assets/images/world.webp' import Subtitle from './../shared/Subtitle' const Home = () => { return ( <> {/* ===hero section start=== */}

Traveling opens the door to creating{" "} memories

Wishing you moments that sparkle with joy, adventures that leave you breathless, and memories that last a lifetime. May each day bring new discoveries and the kind of happiness that only travel can bring.

{/* hero section end */} ) } export default Home
